title: About Us
description: Learn more about our company and mission

sections.title: About Our Company
sections.subtitle: Building the future, one line of code at a time

sections.content:
# Our Story

We started this company with a simple mission: to make technology more accessible and user-friendly for everyone.

## Our Values

- **Innovation**: We're always looking for better ways to solve problems
- **Quality**: We believe in doing things right the first time
- **Community**: We're stronger when we work together

## Our Team

Our diverse team of engineers, designers, and product managers work together to create amazing experiences.

metadata.title: About Us - My App
metadata.description: Learn about our company, mission, values, and the team behind our products
